title: Strengthening Practical Software Development Competencies: Cultural Exploration and Creative Expression through Festivals

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Students can critically analyze and discuss the cultural significance of festivals.

Students Complete a Digital Art Project (e.g., Interactive Storytelling, Animation, Game) Expressing Their Cultural Identity Within Six Months Using Visual Programming Tools Like Scratch or App Inventor and Achieve Over 70 Points (Out of 100) on a Teacher/Peer Evaluation Rubric (Creativity 30%, Technical Implementation 30%, Cultural Expression 40%)

Students Collaborate in Teams of 3–4 to Plan a Software Project Reflecting Inclusive Values in Multicultural Societies (e.g., Cultural Understanding Quiz App, Multicultural Community Platform), Apply at Least Two Inclusive Design Principles (Accessibility, Linguistic Diversity, etc.) During Development, and Achieve Over 70 Points on Peer and Teacher Evaluation Criteria (Creativity 30%, Technical Implementation 30%, Inclusivity 40%)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
